name: Brazil Coffee
description: A rich and flavorful coffee with a smooth taste, sourced from the coffee farms of Brazil.

name: Columbia Coffee
description: A medium-bodied coffee with bright acidity, grown in the highlands of Colombia.

name: Ethiopia Arabica
description: An exotic single-origin Arabica coffee from Ethiopia, known for its fruity and floral notes.

name: Ethiopia Coffee
description: A premium Ethiopian coffee blend, perfect for connoisseurs seeking bold flavors.

name: Ethiopia Robusta
description: A robust and full-bodied coffee with a strong caffeine kick, sourced from Ethiopia.

name: Kenya Coffee
description: A Kenyan coffee with a bright acidity and unique fruity flavors, grown in the Kenyan highlands.

name: Nicaragua 100%
description: A 100% Nicaraguan coffee with a well-balanced flavor profile, perfect for everyday enjoyment.

name: Nicaragua Traditional
description: A traditional Nicaraguan coffee that combines rich flavors with affordability.
